name: hm03
effect: Teaches Surf to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Surf to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Creates a huge wave, then crashes it down on the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: Creates a huge wave, then crashes it down on the foe.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A big wave crashes down on the foe. Can also be used for crossing water.
